description: This file defines the Recipe Detail Page component for a Next.js application, including metadata generation, static path generation, and rendering of recipe details such as hero image, ingredients, steps, nutrition, gallery, and navigation.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Generates dynamic metadata for the recipe page based on recipe content for SEO purposes.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Provides static parameters for Next.js static site generation, based on mock recipe data.

methods.name: RecipeDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the detailed recipe page with all its sections including hero, ingredients, steps, nutrition, and gallery.
